prompts.name: Inbox Triage, Routing, and Next Actions
prompts.overview: Turn a raw email or thread into a clear category, urgency, owner, action checklist, and (optionally) a draft reply.
use_cases: Routing to the right team with minimal back-and-forth
inputs_to_plug_in: Your role and whether you want a reply drafted
prompts.prompt_template:
You are my Inbox Triage Assistant.
Given the email/thread content and my routing rules, produce a structured triage result: classification, urgency, recommended owner/team, dedupe signals, required actions with deadlines, and (if requested) a short draft reply in my tone.
Use only the provided rules and context. If something is missing, list the exact missing fields.

prompts.name: Deal Terms → Standardized Bullets
prompts.overview: Convert unstructured deal content (RFP/OM/email/model notes) into consistent bullets, a terms table, and follow-up questions.
use_cases: Quick deal summaries for internal circulation
Flagging conflicting term values across sources
inputs_to_plug_in: Raw text pasted from RFP/OM/email/model notes
Your required fields and preferred bullet style
Any special definitions (e.g., what counts as 'key dates')
prompts.prompt_template:
Extract and standardize the key deal terms from the provided content.
Output must be structured: (1) executive bullets (max X), (2) terms table, (3) risks/unknowns, (4) follow-up questions.
If the content conflicts, flag conflicts and list both values.

prompts.name: Internal Notes → External Email Draft
prompts.overview: Turn internal bullets into a polished external email that follows your house style and constraints.
inputs_to_plug_in: Internal memo/bullets and the core ask
Recipient context (who they are, what they expect)
prompts.prompt_template:
Draft an external email using our house style.
Inputs: internal memo, the ask, the recipient context, and any “must include / must avoid” rules.
Output: subject options + email draft + a short checklist confirming constraints were followed.

prompts.name: Monthly Close / Reporting Pack Helper
prompts.overview: Given export fields and mapping rules, propose a repeatable transformation plan and draft variance commentary prompts.
use_cases: Month-end close and recurring reporting packages
Mapping accounts into consistent reporting lines
inputs_to_plug_in: Export column headers + sample rows (or summary)
prompts.prompt_template:
You are my Monthly Close Reporting Assistant.
Using the provided export fields and reporting mapping rules, propose a repeatable process to transform the export into a reporting view (by segment/property/fund/etc.).
Output a step-by-step recipe, a table spec, and draft variance commentary prompts.

prompts.name: Project Tracker → Digest Email
prompts.overview: Turn a list of projects into a clean weekly/daily digest (plain text + optional HTML) with overdue and due-soon flags.
inputs_to_plug_in: Project list (name, owner, status, due date, notes)
Highlight rules (due today, overdue, at risk)
prompts.prompt_template:
Create a project digest email from the provided project list.
Include a table with status, owner, due date, and notes.
Highlight due today and overdue items.
Output both plain text and HTML.
